title: av_interleaved_write_frame(): I/O error

labels.name: state:timedOut
labels.description: The issue owner isn't responding to questions

body:
This is the error I'm getting, any help? I'm using default(mostly) settings. The only things I changed are output video width and height, driver(Waify2X Caffe), and video extension.

`[image2 @ 000001d2b6775100] Could not open file : C:\Users\STEVEN~1\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x\tmperudznxe\extracted_29334.png
av_interleaved_write_frame(): I/O error

video:47321249kB audio:0kB subtitle:0kB other streams:0kB global headers:0kB muxing overhead: unknown
Conversion failed!

subprocess.CalledProcessError: Command '['F:\\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\\dependencies\\ffmpeg\\bin\\ffmpeg', '-hwaccel', 'auto', '-y', '-i', 'I:\\Movie\\New Folder\\[Erai-raws] One Piece - 1015 [1080p][24C55AAD].mkv', '-pix_fmt', 'rgb24', 'C:\\Users\\STEVEN~1\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmperudznxe\\extracted_%0d.png']' returned non-zero exit status 1.`
